1.en_source: All you really need is love.
1.sl_trans: Vse, kar resnično potrebujete, je ljubezen.

2.sl_source: Le zakaj misliš, da boš odpuščen zaradi zdravstvenih razlogov?
2.en_source: What makes you so sure you'll get a medical discharge?
2.sl_trans: Zakaj ste tako prepričani, da boste dobili zdravniško razrešnico?

3.en_source: Because I'm a civilian at heart, lover.
3.sl_trans: Ker sem po srcu civilist, ljubimec.

4.en_source: And I always follow my heart.

10.sl_source: Kaj bi rekla, če bi ti jaz rekel ljubica desetarka?
10.en_source: How would you like it if I called you Lieutenant Lover?
10.sl_trans: Kako bi ti bilo všeč, če bi te klical poročnik Lover?

25.en_source: I'm used to it by now.
25.sl_trans: Na to sem se že navadil.

27.sl_source: Zelo ste prijazni, a ne, hvala.
27.en_source: That's very kind, but I think not.
27.sl_trans: To je zelo prijazno, vendar mislim, da ne.

28.sl_source: Saj nimate nič proti, če ga jaz malo?

30.sl_source: V bolnici se alkohol vedno najde.
30.en_source: Where there's a hospital, there's alcohol.
30.sl_trans: Kjer je bolnišnica, je tudi alkohol.

32.en_source: Well, I'll be as brief as possible.

33.sl_source: Pripadam čudni skupini z imenom Force 316.
33.en_source: I belong to a rather rum group called Force 316.
33.sl_trans: Pripadam skupini, ki se imenuje Force 316.

34.en_source: Our headquarters is up in the Botanical Gardens.
34.sl_trans: Naš sedež je v botaničnem vrtu.

35.en_source: Protecting rare plants from the enemy?

37.en_source: Sure you won't have a martini?
37.sl_trans: Ste prepričani, da ne boste pili martinija?

39.sl_source: Med drugim nas zelo zanima železnica, na kateri ste delali.
39.en_source: We have a particular interest in that railway you worked on.
39.sl_trans: Še posebej nas zanima železnica, na kateri ste delali.

40.sl_source: Lahko bi bili dragocen vir informacij.
40.en_source: You could give us no end of valuable information.
40.sl_trans: Lahko bi nam dali veliko dragocenih informacij.

41.sl_source: Odhajam nazaj v ZDA, poleg tega pa sem že vse povedal vašim obveščevalcem.
41.en_source: Well, I'm leaving for the States in a few days and I've already told your people everything I know.
41.sl_trans: Čez nekaj dni odhajam v ZDA in vašim ljudem sem že povedal vse, kar vem.

42.sl_source: Lahko bi nam kljub temu pomagali.
42.en_source: But you could help us in a rather special sense.
42.sl_trans: Lahko pa nam pomagate v precej posebnem smislu.

43.sl_source: Vem, da vas nadlegujem, a bi nas vseeno prišli pogledat?
43.en_source: I know it's a terrible imposition but I wonder if you could possibly come out and see us.
43.sl_trans: Vem, da je to strašno naporno, vendar me zanima, ali bi nas lahko obiskali.

44.sl_source: Če hočete vse še preveriti, bom prišel.
44.en_source: Well, if you want to go over the whole thing again.
44.sl_trans: No, če želite še enkrat pregledati celotno zadevo.

49.en_source: We're one of his special pigeons.
49.sl_trans: Smo eden od njegovih posebnih golobov.

50.sl_source: Torej se vidimo nocoj okrog osmih?
50.en_source: Shall we say this evening, about 8?

51.en_source: I'll send a car for you.

52.en_source: This evening is out of the question.
52.sl_trans: Ta večer ne pride v poštev.

59.sl_source: Vem, da ti je zelo žal, a nocoj ne bova šla ven, ne?
59.en_source: I know, you're terribly sorry, but you're going to stand me up tonight.
59.sl_trans: Vem, da ti je grozno žal, ampak nocoj me boš postavil na noge.

60.sl_source: Bolj se ne bi mogla motiti.
60.sl_trans: Ne bi se mogli bolj motiti.

61.en_source: May I see your pass, sir, please?
61.sl_trans: Ali lahko vidim vašo izkaznico, gospod, prosim?

63.sl_source: Bungalov major Wardena je na koncu te poti.
63.en_source: Major Warden's bungalow is at the end of the path.
63.sl_trans: Na koncu poti je bungalov majorja Wardena.

68.en_source: Always use your knife immediately, Joyce.

69.en_source: You see, he's gained the initiative.

74.en_source: I'm American, if that's what you mean.
74.sl_trans: Američan sem, če misliš na to.

77.en_source: What can I do for you, sir?
77.sl_trans: Kaj lahko storim za vas, gospod?

78.en_source: I was on my way to see Major Warden.
78.sl_trans: Bil sem na poti k majorju Wardenu.

80.en_source: He'll finish his lecture any moment now.
80.sl_trans: Vsak trenutek bo končal svoje predavanje.

81.en_source: That's the end of his lecture.

83.sl_source: Po majorjevem mnenju mora biti vaja karseda resnična.
83.en_source: He believes in keeping our training as close to real life as possible.
83.sl_trans: Prepričan je, da se mora naše usposabljanje čim bolj približati resničnemu življenju.

85.en_source: Very good of you to come.

86.sl_source: Upam, da so lepo poskrbeli za vas.
86.en_source: I hope they took care of you.
86.sl_trans: Upam, da so poskrbeli za vas.

88.sl_trans: No, potem pa pojdi z nami.

89.en_source: Colonel Green is looking forward to meeting you.
89.sl_trans: Polkovnik Green se veseli srečanja z vami.

92.sl_source: Nisem vedel, da je to šola za komandose.
92.en_source: Didn't realise it was a commando school.
92.sl_trans: Nisem vedel, da je bila to šola za komandose.

93.sl_source: Tej besedi se izogibamo, tako melodramatično zveni.
93.en_source: We're trying to discourage the use of that word, such a melodramatic air.
93.sl_trans: Poskušamo preprečiti uporabo te besede, ki je tako melodramatična.

95.en_source: Sabotage, demolition, that line of country.
95.sl_trans: Sabotaža, rušenje, to je področje države.

98.sl_source: Za tisto eksplozijo smo potrebovali samo pol tega.
98.en_source: That pop was made with a lump half this size.
98.sl_trans: Ta pop je bil narejen s pol manjšo kocko.

99.sl_source: Dvakrat močnejši je od drugih eksplozivov in pol lažji.
99.en_source: It's twice as powerful as gelignite and only half the weight.
99.sl_trans: Je dvakrat močnejši od gelignita in za polovico lažji.

100.sl_source: Dokler ni sprožen je povsem neškodljiv.
100.en_source: It's quite harmless until it's detonated.
100.sl_trans: Dokler ga ne razneseš, je povsem neškodljiv.

102.en_source: It's completely waterproof and actually plastic.
102.sl_trans: Je popolnoma vodoodporen in pravzaprav plastičen.

103.sl_source: Po mili volji ga lahko oblikuješ.
103.en_source: You can do what you like with it.
103.sl_trans: Z njim lahko naredite, kar želite.

106.en_source: Oh, I'm dying for a cup of tea.

111.en_source: Pot of tea for one, please, Peter.
111.sl_trans: Petr, prosim, skodelico čaja za enega.

114.sl_source: Orientalske jezike sem pred vojno učil na Cambridgu.
114.en_source: Oh, I taught Oriental languages at Cambridge before the war.
114.sl_trans: Pred vojno sem na Cambridgeu poučeval orientalske jezike.

115.sl_source: Mimogrede, naj vam čestitam za pobeg.
115.en_source: I never congratulated you on your escape.
115.sl_trans: Nikoli vam nisem čestital za pobeg.

117.sl_source: Če me nebi odkrili vaši, me danes nebi bilo tu.
117.en_source: If your sea-rescue plane hadn't spotted me, I wouldn't be here.
117.sl_trans: Če me ne bi opazilo vaše reševalno letalo, me ne bi bilo tukaj.

122.en_source: It's mostly based on your report.

123.sl_source: Predvidevamo, da je taborišče nekje tukaj.
123.en_source: But we think the camp is about here.
123.sl_trans: Vendar menimo, da je tabor že tu.

124.sl_source: Pa vaši obveščevalci vedo, kako je z Nicholsonom?
124.en_source: Say, do your people have any idea what happened to Colonel Nicholson?
124.sl_trans: Ali vaši ljudje vedo, kaj se je zgodilo s polkovnikom Nicholsonom?

126.sl_source: Hoteli so ga ustreliti, on pa ni niti trenil.
126.en_source: They were about to shoot him and he didn't bat an eye.
126.sl_trans: Bili so na tem, da ga ustrelijo, on pa ni niti trenil z očesom.

127.sl_source: Če vas nameravajo ustreliti, ni kaj dosti storiti.
127.en_source: If you're about to be shot there's not much you can do.
127.sl_trans: Če vas bodo ustrelili, ne morete storiti veliko.

128.sl_source: Tu je reka Kwai, tu pa vas, kjer so vam pomagali.
128.en_source: Here is the River Kwai, and here is the village where you were helped.
128.sl_trans: Tu je reka Kwai in tu je vas, kjer so vam pomagali.

130.sl_source: A saj to veste bolje od mene.
130.en_source: But then you must be fairly familiar with all this area.
130.sl_trans: Vendar pa morate biti na tem področju precej dobro seznanjeni.

131.sl_source: Niti ne, saj večino časa nisem bil pri pravi.
131.en_source: Not really, I was out of my head half the time.
131.sl_trans: Niti ne, saj sem bil polovico časa brez pameti.

132.sl_source: Železnica naj bi tekla od Singapurja prek Malezije,
132.en_source: The railway starts down here in Singapore, through Malaysia,
132.sl_trans: Železnica se začne v Singapurju in poteka skozi Malezijo,

133.sl_source: Bangkoka in Rangoona vse do Indije

136.sl_source: Do sredine maja nameravajo Japonci zgraditi odsek od Bangkoka do Rangoona.
136.en_source: The Japanese aim to open the Bangkok- Rangoon section by the middle of May.
136.sl_trans: Japonci nameravajo odsek Bangkok-Rangoon odpreti do sredine maja.

137.en_source: Naturally, we'll try to prevent them.

138.sl_source: Za bombnike je predaleč, da bi odvrgli bombe.
138.en_source: It's too far for bombers to carry an adequate load.
138.sl_trans: Za bombnike je predaleč, da bi lahko nosili ustrezen tovor.

139.sl_source: Zato bomo morali to storiti po kopnem.
139.en_source: We'll have to go smash it on the ground.
139.sl_trans: Morali ga bomo razbiti na tleh.

141.sl_source: Skočili bomo s padalom in nadaljevali peš.

142.en_source: With demolition equipment through that jungle?
142.sl_trans: Z opremo za rušenje skozi džunglo?

143.sl_source: Težava je le v tem, da nimamo znanja iz prve roke.
143.en_source: Our chief problem is lack of firsthand knowledge.
143.sl_trans: Naša glavna težava je pomanjkanje znanja iz prve roke.

144.sl_source: Med nami še nihče ni bil tam.
144.en_source: You see, none of us have ever been there.
144.sl_trans: Veste, nihče od nas še ni bil tam.

147.sl_source: Green mi je naročil, naj poskrbim za most na reki Kwai.
147.en_source: Colonel Green's given me the Kwai bridge.
147.sl_trans: Polkovnik Green mi je dal most Kwai.

148.en_source: I'm gonna take a team in and blow it up.
148.sl_trans: Vzel bom ekipo in jo razstrelil.

150.sl_trans: Ste prepričani, da ne boste pili čaja?

152.sl_source: Ne bi bil rad nevljuden a ob dveh imam zmenek.
152.en_source: I don't want to be rude, but I've got a luncheon date at 2.
152.sl_trans: Nočem biti nesramen, vendar imam ob 14. uri sestanek na kosilu.

153.en_source: So if there are any questions....

155.en_source: Well, there is only one question, actually.

156.en_source: How would you feel about going back?
156.sl_trans: Kako bi se počutili, če bi se vrnili?

158.sl_source: Vem, da vas veliko prosim, toda vaše znanje in izkušnje so neprecenljive.
158.en_source: I know, under the circumstances, it's a bit much but you have a unique knowledge for our purpose.
158.sl_trans: Vem, da je v danih okoliščinah to nekoliko preveč, vendar imate edinstveno znanje za naš namen.

159.sl_source: Z veseljem bi vas vzeli s sabo.
159.en_source: And we'd love to have you with us.
159.sl_trans: Z veseljem bi vas povabili z nami.

160.en_source: That's why you brought me here?

162.sl_source: Komaj sem se izvlekel od tam.
162.en_source: Major, I just got out of there.
162.sl_trans: Major, pravkar sem prišel od tam.

164.sl_source: Sedaj pa me hočete poslati nazaj?
164.en_source: Now you want me to go back? Don't be ridiculous!
164.sl_trans: Zdaj želite, da se vrnem? Ne bodi smešen!

166.sl_source: Ne pripadam vam, ampak ameriški mornarici.
166.en_source: I don't belong to you, I belong to the American Navy.
166.sl_trans: Ne pripadam vam, pripadam ameriški mornarici.

167.sl_source: Toda polkovnik Green je o tem že govoril z vašimi.
167.en_source: Actually, Colonel Green has taken the matter up with your people.
167.sl_trans: Pravzaprav je polkovnik Green zadevo obravnaval z vašimi ljudmi.

168.sl_source: Mornarica vas je že premestila v našo enoto.
168.en_source: Your Navy's turned you over to us.
168.sl_trans: Vaša mornarica vas je predala nam.

169.en_source: They can't do this to me.

171.sl_source: S težkim srcem vam to sporočam.
171.en_source: It was difficult to know how to break it to you.
171.sl_trans: Težko sem vedel, kako naj vam to povem.

172.en_source: But they can't do this to me.
172.sl_trans: Toda tega mi ne morejo storiti.

174.en_source: I'm not a Navy commander, I'm not even an officer.
174.sl_trans: Nisem poveljnik mornarice, nisem niti častnik.

175.en_source: I'm just an ordinary swab jockey, second class.
175.sl_trans: Sem le navaden žakelj za tampone, drugorazredni delavec.

176.sl_source: Ko se je Houston potopila, sem na obalo priplaval s pravim častnikom.
176.en_source: When the Houston sunk, I made it ashore with a real commander.
176.sl_trans: Ko se je Houston potopil, sem se s pravim poveljnikom izkrcal na kopno.

177.en_source: Later on, we ran into a Japanese patrol.
177.sl_trans: Kasneje smo naleteli na japonsko patruljo.

179.sl_source: Bilo je samo vprašanje časa, kdaj bodo ujeli še mene.
179.en_source: I figured it was just a matter of time before I was captured--
179.sl_trans: Mislil sem, da je samo še vprašanje časa, kdaj me bodo ujeli...

180.sl_source: Torej ste slekli uniformo z mrtvega častnika?
180.en_source: So you changed uniforms with a dead man.
180.sl_trans: Torej ste zamenjali uniformo z mrtvim moškim.

181.sl_source: Predvideval sem, da s častniki lepše ravnajo.
181.en_source: I thought officers would get better treatment.
181.sl_trans: Mislil sem, da bodo policisti bolje obravnavani.

182.sl_source: Toda Saito je tudi od častnikov zahteval, da delajo z ostalimi vojaki.
182.en_source: But at Saito's camp, the officers worked along with the rest.
182.sl_trans: Toda v Saitovem taboru so častniki delali skupaj z ostalimi.

183.en_source: Yes, there's always the unexpected, isn't there?
183.sl_trans: Da, vedno se zgodi kaj nepričakovanega, kajne?

184.sl_source: Kar navadil sem se na svoj novi čin in ko sem prispel v bolnišnico, sem se odločil ohraniti svoj status še nekaj časa.
184.en_source: I kind of got used to being a commander so when I arrived here at the hospital I took a look at the enlisted men's ward and then the officer's ward and I said to myself, "Let's let it ride along for a while."
184.sl_trans: Nekako sem se navadil, da sem poveljnik, zato sem si ob prihodu v bolnišnico ogledal oddelek za podčastnike in nato še oddelek za častnike in si rekel: "Nekaj časa pustimo to na cedilu."

186.en_source: I saw one of them on the beach.

188.sl_source: Dejstvo je, da me ne morete uporabiti.
188.en_source: The point is, you can't use me.
188.sl_trans: Bistvo je, da me ne morete uporabiti.

189.sl_source: Želite ameriška komandirja po imenu Shears, ki ne obstaja.
189.en_source: You want an officer an American commander named Shears who doesn't exist.
189.sl_trans: Želite častnika, ameriškega poveljnika z imenom Shears, ki ne obstaja.

190.sl_source: Ko bo mornarica to odkrila, me bodo uklenjenega poslali domov.
190.en_source: When the Navy learns the truth, they'll say: "Ship him home in irons for impersonating an officer."
190.sl_trans: Ko bo mornarica izvedela resnico, bo rekla: "Pošljite ga domov v železja, ker se je izdajal za častnika."

191.en_source: Once that happens, I've got it made.
191.sl_trans: Ko se bo to zgodilo, bom to naredil.

193.sl_source: Prosil bom za odpust iz zdravstvenih razlogov.
193.en_source: I'll apply for a medical discharge.
193.sl_trans: Zaprosil bom za odpust iz zdravstvenih razlogov.

194.sl_source: Rekel bom, da sem se izdajal za častnika, ker se mi je v pragozdu zmešalo.
194.en_source: I'll tell them I impersonated an officer because I went off my rocker in the jungle.
194.sl_trans: Povedal jim bom, da sem se izdajal za policista, ker mi je v džungli prekipelo.

195.sl_trans: Vedite, da mi gre vse slabše.

196.sl_source: Včasih si domišljam, da sem admiral Halsey.
196.en_source: Sometimes I think I'm Admiral Halsey.
196.sl_trans: Včasih mislim, da sem admiral Halsey.

198.en_source: It's not only clever, it's foolproof.
198.sl_trans: Ni le pametna, ampak tudi zanesljiva.

199.sl_source: Če me bodo v mornarici razkrinkali, bodo ukazi neveljavni.
199.en_source: If my Navy finds out who I am those temporary orders won't be worth the paper they're written on.
199.sl_trans: Če bo mornarica izvedela, kdo sem, ti začasni nalogi ne bodo vredni niti papirja, na katerem so napisani.

200.en_source: This is your photograph, isn't it?

202.sl_source: Sploh ni bilo lahko, saj vas vaši sprva niso identificirali.
202.en_source: It took a bit of doing because your people couldn't identify you.
202.sl_trans: To je zahtevalo nekaj truda, ker vas vaši ljudje niso mogli prepoznati.

203.sl_source: Potem pa so nam poslali kopijo vaše kartoteke.
203.en_source: Finally your ClNC Pacific sent us a copy of your service record.
203.sl_trans: Nazadnje nam je vaša družba ClNC Pacific poslala kopijo vaše službene evidence.

205.en_source: Would you care to have a look?

206.sl_source: Vaš pravi čin poznamo že skoraj teden dni.
206.en_source: You see, we've known about your actual rank for nearly a week.
206.sl_trans: Za vaš dejanski rang vemo že skoraj teden dni.

207.en_source: Your Navy's in an awkward position.
207.sl_trans: Vaša mornarica je v nerodnem položaju.

208.sl_source: Po eni strani ste junak, ker ste pobegnili iz pragozda.
208.en_source: In one sense you're a blasted hero for making an escape from the jungle.
208.sl_trans: Po eni strani ste prekleti junak, ker vam je uspelo pobegniti iz džungle.

209.sl_source: Hkrati pa vas ne morejo odlikovati, ker ste se izdajali za častnika.
209.en_source: But at the same time, they can't bring you home and give you the Navy Cross for impersonating an officer.
209.sl_trans: Toda hkrati vas ne morejo pripeljati domov in vam podeliti mornariškega križa, ker ste se izdajali za častnika.

210.sl_source: Zato so vas z veseljem predali nam.
210.en_source: I suppose that's why they were so happy to hand you over to us.
210.sl_trans: Verjetno so nam vas zato tako radi predali.

213.sl_source: V Force 316 se ne menimo dosti za čine.
213.en_source: As far as your present rank is concerned we're fairly informal about those things in Force 316.
213.sl_trans: Kar zadeva vaš trenutni čin, smo v enoti 316 glede teh stvari dokaj neformalni.

214.en_source: You'd have the simulated rank of major.

216.sl_source: Ker nimam izbire, se bom kar prostovoljno javil.
216.en_source: Well, as long as I'm hooked, I might as well volunteer.
216.sl_trans: No, dokler sem zasvojen, se lahko prijavim tudi kot prostovoljec.

220.sl_source: Javil se je, da mi bo pomagal razstreliti most.
220.en_source: He volunteered to go and help me blow up the bridge.
220.sl_trans: Prijavil se je, da mi bo pomagal razstreliti most.

223.en_source: Get up to sick bay, Baker.

225.en_source: The colonel might think I'm malingering.
225.sl_trans: Polkovnik bi lahko mislil, da se sleparim.

228.sl_source: Bi mi že kdo povedal, zakaj hoče zgraditi pravi most?
228.en_source: Will someone tell me why the old man wants us to build a proper bridge?
228.sl_trans: Naj mi kdo pove, zakaj stari gospod želi, da zgradimo pravi most?

229.sl_source: Ne skrbi, stari Nick ve kaj dela.
229.en_source: Don't you worry about old Nick, he knows what he's doing.
229.sl_trans: Ne skrbi za starega Nicka, saj ve, kaj počne.

231.sl_source: Skrajni čas je že bil, da ste prišli.
231.en_source: About time you paid us a visit.

232.en_source: Fine job our chaps are doing.

234.sl_source: Prav razumen je, odkar smo prevzeli pobudo.
234.en_source: He's been most reasonable since we took over.
234.sl_trans: Odkar smo ga prevzeli, je najbolj razumen.

241.sl_source: Ste prepričani, da je gradnja mostu dobra ideja?
241.en_source: Sir, are you convinced that building this bridge is a good idea?
241.sl_trans: Gospod, ali ste prepričani, da je gradnja tega mostu dobra zamisel?

246.sl_source: Ne bi rekli, da je morala na višku?
246.en_source: You don't agree morale is high?
246.sl_trans: Se ne strinjate, da je morala visoka?

249.en_source: Are they a happier lot or aren't they?

250.sl_source: Dobro jedo in z njimi lepo ravnajo.
250.en_source: They feed better and they are no longer abused.
250.sl_trans: Bolje se hranijo in niso več zlorabljeni.

251.sl_source: Včasih vas res ne razumem, Clipton.
251.en_source: Honestly, Clipton, there are times when I don't understand you at all.
251.sl_trans: Iskreno, Clipton, včasih te sploh ne razumem.

252.en_source: I'll try to make myself clear, sir.

253.sl_source: Temu, kar počnemo, bi lahko rekli... sodelovanje s sovražnikom.
253.en_source: The fact is, what we're doing could be construed as forgive me, sir, collaboration with the enemy.
253.sl_trans: Dejstvo je, da bi lahko to, kar počnemo, razumeli kot, oprostite, sodelovanje s sovražnikom.

255.sl_source: Vojni ujetniki smo, nimamo pravice odklanjati dela.
255.en_source: We're prisoners of war, we haven't the right to refuse to work.
255.sl_trans: Smo vojni ujetniki, nimamo pravice zavrniti dela.

257.sl_source: Pa moramo to tako dobro opraviti?
257.en_source: But must we work so well?
257.sl_trans: Toda ali moramo delati tako dobro?

258.sl_source: Moramo postaviti boljši most, kot bi znali oni sami?
258.en_source: Must we build them a better bridge than they could have themselves?
258.sl_trans: Ali jim moramo zgraditi boljši most, kot bi ga lahko zgradili sami?

259.sl_source: Bi Saita operirali po najboljših močeh, ali bi ga pustili umreti?
259.en_source: If you had to operate on Saito, would you do your best or let him die?
259.sl_trans: Če bi morali operirati Saito, bi se potrudili po svojih najboljših močeh ali ga pustili umreti?

260.sl_source: Bi raje videli, da bataljon zapade v malodušje?
260.en_source: Would you prefer we disintegrate in idleness?
260.sl_trans: Ali bi raje, da bi razpadli v brezdelju?

261.en_source: Would you have it said that our chaps can't do a proper job?
261.sl_trans: Ali želite, da bi rekli, da naši fantje ne znajo opraviti ustreznega dela?

262.sl_source: Pomembno jim je pokazati, da nas niso strli!
262.en_source: It's important to show these people they can't break us in body or in spirit.
262.sl_trans: Pomembno je, da tem ljudem pokažemo, da nas ne morejo zlomiti ne v telesu ne v duhu.

263.sl_source: Dobro si oglejte ta most, Clipton.

265.sl_source: Upam, da se bodo ljudje, ki bodo most uporabljali tudi potem spominjali, kdo in kako ga je zgradil.
265.en_source: I hope that the people who use this bridge in years to come will remember how it was built, and who built it.
265.sl_trans: Upam, da se bodo ljudje, ki bodo v prihodnjih letih uporabljali ta most, spominjali, kako je bil zgrajen in kdo ga je zgradil.

266.sl_source: Ne banda sužnjev, ampak britanski vojaki, celo v ujetništvu.
266.en_source: Not a gang of slaves, but soldiers. British soldiers, even in captivity.
266.sl_trans: Ne gre za tolpo sužnjev, temveč za vojake. Britanski vojaki, tudi v ujetništvu.

268.sl_source: Dober zdravnik ste, ampak o vojski se morate še veliko naučiti.
268.en_source: You're a fine doctor but you've a lot to learn about the army.
268.sl_trans: Ste dober zdravnik, vendar se morate še veliko naučiti o vojski.

272.en_source: What on earth are you people staring at?

273.en_source: I'm awfully sorry I'm late, sir.
273.sl_trans: Zelo mi je žal, da zamujam, gospod.

274.en_source: Four minutes late, to be exact.

275.en_source: You were in need of medical attention?

277.sl_source: V mislih sem imel bolniško sestro.
277.en_source: I was referring to the nurse.

281.sl_source: Povabil sem vas zato, da bi skupaj izbrali četrtega člana odprave.
281.en_source: I asked you here to help us pick the fourth member of your team.
281.sl_trans: Prosil sem vas, da nam pomagate izbrati četrtega člana vaše ekipe.

282.en_source: Ask Mr. Joyce to come in.

284.sl_source: Chapman predlaga Joyca, ampak jaz imam pomisleke.
284.en_source: Chapman here wants Joyce, but I have my doubts about him.
284.sl_trans: Chapman si želi Joycea, vendar dvomim o njem.

285.sl_source: Po mojem ima preveč domišljije in je premalo hladnokrven.
285.en_source: I think he has too much imagination as distinct from cold calculation.
285.sl_trans: Mislim, da ima preveč domišljije, ne pa hladne preračunljivosti.

286.sl_source: Kot sem vam rekel, pri takem delu vedno ostane kaj nedokončano.
286.en_source: As I've told you before in this job, even when it's finished there's always one more thing to do.
286.sl_trans: Kot sem vam pri tem delu že povedal, je tudi po končanem delu vedno treba narediti še eno stvar.

287.en_source: He's the best swimmer in the school, sir.
287.sl_trans: Je najboljši plavalec na šoli, gospod.

288.en_source: I'm well aware of your evaluation.

289.en_source: The opinion I want is Shears'.
289.sl_trans: Mnenje, ki ga želim, je Shearsovo.

291.sl_source: Tile bi vas vzeli s sabo na potep po pragozdu.
291.en_source: These gentlemen are thinking of taking you for a hike into the jungle.
291.sl_trans: Ti gospodje vas nameravajo peljati na pohod v džunglo.

293.en_source: You were an accountant in Montreal?

296.sl_source: Preverjal sem račune, ki so jih pred mano že preverjali in za mano so jih ponovno preverili.
296.en_source: Well, sir, I just checked columns and columns of figures which people had checked before me and then other people checked them after I had checked them.
296.sl_trans: Gospod, preveril sem le stolpce in stolpce številk, ki so jih pred menoj preverili drugi, po mojem preverjanju pa so jih preverili še drugi.

298.en_source: Sir, it was a frightful bore.

299.en_source: How did you happen to wind up here?

300.sl_source: Leta 1939 sem se javil v vojsko.
300.en_source: In '39 I came over to London to enlist.
300.sl_trans: Leta 39 sem prišel v London, da bi se vpisal v vojsko.

301.sl_source: Dve leti kasneje sem prostovoljno prišel sem.
301.en_source: About two years later I volunteered for this work.
301.sl_trans: Približno dve leti pozneje sem se prostovoljno prijavil za to delo.

304.en_source: Go ahead, you can be frank.

305.sl_source: Redna vojska me je spominjala na službo.
305.en_source: Well, the regular army reminded me of my job in civilian life.
305.sl_trans: Redna vojska me je spominjala na moje delo v civilnem življenju.

306.sl_source: Od tebe ne pričakujejo, da boš razmišljal.
306.en_source: They don't expect you to think.

308.en_source: Are you quite sure you'd be able to use it in cold blood?
308.sl_trans: Ste prepričani, da bi ga lahko hladnokrvno uporabili?

309.en_source: I know how to use it, sir.

311.en_source: Could you use it in cold blood?

313.sl_source: To sem se že večkrat vprašal.
313.en_source: That's a question I've often asked myself, sir.
313.sl_trans: To je vprašanje, ki sem si ga pogosto zastavljal, gospod.

314.en_source: It's worried me quite a bit.

317.sl_trans: Poskušal sem si predstavljati samega sebe....

318.sl_source: Težko si dopovem, da ubijanje ni zločin.
318.en_source: I suppose I find it hard to kid myself that killing isn't a crime.
318.sl_trans: Verjetno se težko slepim, da ubijanje ni zločin.

322.en_source: Am I to go with the team, sir?
322.sl_trans: Ali naj grem z ekipo, gospod?

325.en_source: Well, at least he was honest.

326.sl_source: Na to vprašanje lahko odgovorimo šele v danem trenutku.
326.en_source: None of us ever know the answer to that question until the moment arises.
326.sl_trans: Nihče od nas nikoli ne pozna odgovora na to vprašanje, dokler se ne pojavi trenutek.

329.sl_source: Kot tak bo dopolnjeval mednarodno ekipo.
329.en_source: And that's in keeping with the international composition of this outfit.
329.sl_trans: To je v skladu z mednarodno sestavo te obleke.

330.sl_source: Če res tako želi iti, gre lahko namesto mene!
330.en_source: If he wants to go, he can even take my place.
330.sl_trans: Če hoče iti, lahko prevzame moje mesto.

331.sl_source: Če se vsi strinjate, gre z vami.
331.en_source: Well, if you're all agreed on Joyce, he's yours.
331.sl_trans: Če se strinjate z Joyceom, je vaš.

332.sl_source: Tu je poročilo izvidniških letal o vaši vasi.
332.en_source: I had a report from air reconnaissance on that village.
332.sl_trans: O tej vasi sem dobil poročilo iz zračnega izvidovanja.

333.sl_source: Tam je dovolj prostora za doskok s padalom v mraku.
333.en_source: There's sufficient clearing to make your jump at last light.
333.sl_trans: Na voljo je dovolj prostega prostora za skok ob zadnjem svitu.

337.en_source: Silly, it never occurred to me.
337.sl_trans: Neumno, nikoli mi ni prišlo na misel.

340.sl_source: Takoj poskrbite za nekaj poskusnih skokov.
340.en_source: Arrange some practice jumps for him.

341.en_source: I'll pop over and check right away.

342.en_source: All right, Chapman, you can run along.
342.sl_trans: V redu, Chapman, lahko tečeš naprej.

343.en_source: Well, feel like a sniff of air?

345.sl_source: Niti ne zavedate se ne, kakšna pridobitev ste za nas.
345.en_source: You don't realise what a plum you are for us.
345.sl_trans: Ne zavedate se, kako zelo nam koristite.

346.sl_source: Vaše poznavanje območja, prijateljevanje z vaščani.
346.en_source: Your knowledge of the area, making friends in that village.
346.sl_trans: Vaše poznavanje območja, sklepanje prijateljstev v tej vasi.

347.sl_source: Zdi se, kot da ste nas imeli v mislih, ko ste pobegnili.
347.en_source: It's almost as if your whole escape had been planned with us in mind.
347.sl_trans: Zdi se, kot da je bil ves vaš pobeg načrtovan z mislijo na nas.

348.sl_source: Mimogrede, nekaj, kar vas bo zanimalo.
348.en_source: By the way, here's something that'll interest you.
348.sl_trans: Mimogrede, tukaj je nekaj, kar vas bo zanimalo.

351.sl_source: S kot smrtonosna. Povzroči hitro, nebolečo smrt.

352.en_source: Much better than the old ones.

354.sl_source: Z drugimi besedami, živega me ne smejo ujeti.
354.en_source: You're telling me not to be taken alive.
354.sl_trans: Pravite mi, da me ne smete vzeti živega.

356.sl_source: Če se komu na poti kaj zgodi, ga bodo pustili, kjer je.
356.en_source: If any of you get hurt or wounded the others will have to leave him behind.
356.sl_trans: Če bo kdo od vas ranjen ali poškodovan, ga bodo morali drugi pustiti za seboj.

357.en_source: The objective comes first in our work.
357.sl_trans: Cilj je pri našem delu na prvem mestu.

358.sl_source: Poročnik, želite slišati moje mnenje o skupini?
358.en_source: You want my honest evaluation of this team?
358.sl_trans: Želite mojo iskreno oceno te ekipe?

359.en_source: I didn't want to speak out in front of them.

361.sl_trans: S Chapmanom bo vse v redu.

363.sl_source: Joyce se bo tudi dobro držal.
363.sl_trans: Joyce je.... Z njim bo vse v redu.

366.en_source: Cambridge don and all of that.

367.sl_source: Z eksplozivom se igra kot otrok s petardami.
367.en_source: It's one thing to play with explosives like a kid with firecrackers--
367.sl_trans: Eno je igrati se z eksplozivi kot otrok s petardami...

368.en_source: He's not without experience, you know.

370.en_source: And many other installations before the Japs caught him.
370.sl_trans: Preden so ga Japonci ujeli, je imel še veliko drugih objektov.

373.sl_source: Glede na čas mislijo, da se poskusni skoki ne bi splačali.
373.en_source: In view of time, they don't think practice jumps would be worthwhile.
373.sl_trans: Glede na čas menijo, da se jim vadbeni skoki ne bi izplačali.

374.sl_source: Soglašali so, da je za Shearsa najbolje, da skoči in upa na najboljše.
374.en_source: The consensus is, the most sensible thing for Major Shears to do is to go ahead and jump and hope for the best.
374.sl_trans: Po splošnem mnenju je najbolj smiselno, da major Shears skoči in upa na najboljše.

379.sl_source: Yai meni, da nam po tej poti ne bo uspelo doseči reke Kwai.
379.en_source: Yai says we can't reach the Kwai by the route you took.
379.sl_trans: Yai pravi, da po poti, ki ste jo ubrali, ne moremo priti do reke Kwai.

380.en_source: There are too many Japanese patrols.

381.sl_source: Šli bomo na sever skozi gost pragozd.
381.en_source: We'll swing north through heavy jungle.
381.sl_trans: Skozi gosto džunglo bomo krenili proti severu.

386.sl_source: To pomeni, da bodo tovor nosile ženske.
386.en_source: Which means we shall have to use women bearers.
386.sl_trans: To pomeni, da bomo morali uporabiti ženske nosilke.

388.sl_trans: Povedali so mi, da so zelo sposobni.

389.sl_source: Pravi, da ni varno tukaj prespati.
389.en_source: He says it's dangerous to spend the night in the village.
389.sl_trans: Pravi, da je prenočevanje v vasi nevarno.

390.sl_source: 6 km stran je sovražniška postojanka, zato bomo spali v pragozdu.
390.en_source: There's an enemy post three miles away so we'll have to sleep in the jungle.
390.sl_trans: Tri milje stran je sovražnikova postojanka, zato bomo morali spati v džungli.

394.sl_source: Govorite Yaijev jezik, jaz pa ne.
394.en_source: You speak Yai's language and I don't.
394.sl_trans: Ti govoriš Yaijev jezik, jaz pa ne.

395.sl_source: Vodil vas bo po poti, ki je jaz ne poznam.
395.en_source: He's gonna lead you back to the river by a route I never took.
395.sl_trans: Do reke te bo popeljal po poti, po kateri jaz nisem nikoli šel.

396.sl_source: Zakaj me potem tako nujno potrebujete?
396.en_source: Will someone tell me why I'm so indispensable to this outfit?
396.sl_trans: Ali mi bo kdo povedal, zakaj sem tako nepogrešljiv za to obleko?

397.sl_source: Vem, kako vam je, toda vedno se lahko zgodi kaj nepričakovanega.
397.en_source: I know how you feel, but there's always the unexpected, isn't there?
397.sl_trans: Vem, kako se počutiš, a vedno se zgodi kaj nepričakovanega, kajne?

404.en_source: She's telling you to hold still.
404.sl_trans: Govori vam, naj se ne premikate.

405.sl_source: Pijavke vam bo pobrala s hrbta.
405.en_source: She'll take the leeches off your back.
405.sl_trans: Odstranila bo pijavke z vašega hrbta.

406.sl_source: In kaj tako čedno dekle počne na takem kraju?
406.en_source: What's a nice girl like you doing in a place like this?
406.sl_trans: Kaj počne lepo dekle, kot si ti, na takšnem kraju?

407.sl_source: Naučil vas bom to povedati po njihovo.
407.en_source: I'll teach you to say that in Siamese.
407.sl_trans: Naučil te bom, kako se to reče v siamščini.

409.en_source: Too much talk always spoils it.

410.sl_source: Kaj je narobe s to škatlo?
410.sl_trans: Kaj je narobe s to stvarjo?

412.en_source: I can't get a strong signal.

413.sl_source: Vam jaz povem, kaj je narobe.
413.sl_trans: Povedal vam bom, kaj je narobe.

415.sl_source: Kot vse drugo v tem pragozdu.
415.en_source: Like everything else in this jungle.
415.sl_trans: Kot vse drugo v tej džungli.

416.en_source: You might as well dump it!

417.sl_source: S tem zaključujemo program Radia Tokio.
417.en_source: This is Radio Tokyo signing off.

418.sl_source: Vaš najprijaznejši sovražnik vam svetuje, da se ne naprezate in ne delate ničesar prostovoljno.
418.en_source: This is your friendliest enemy reminding you to take it easy and never volunteer for anything.
418.sl_trans: To je vaš najprijaznejši sovražnik, ki vas opominja, da se ne obremenjujte in da se nikoli za nič ne prijavite prostovoljno.

419.en_source: If we stay, we'll be up to our necks.
419.sl_trans: Če bomo ostali, bomo imeli vse do vratu.

420.en_source: I've got it all decoded, sir.

423.sl_trans: "Prvič, prvotna dela na mostu so bila opuščena.

424.sl_source: Nov most gradijo nižje ob reki.
424.en_source: New construction downstream from first site.
424.sl_trans: Nova gradnja v smeri toka od prve lokacije.

425.sl_source: Drugič: Sovražnik bo odprl železnico s posebnim vlakom polnim vojakov in pomembnih osebnosti
425.en_source: Two, enemy intends to open railway with passage of special train Bangkok for Rangoon with troops and V.l.P.
425.sl_trans: Drugič, sovražnik namerava odpreti železnico s posebnim vlakom Bangkok za Rangoon z vojaki in V.l.P.

426.sl_source: Vlak bo prispel predvidoma 13. maja dopoldne.
426.sl_trans: Pričakuje se, da bodo prispeli cilj, a.m. 13th.

427.sl_source: Tretjič: uskladiti uničenje mostu s prihodom vlaka.
427.en_source: Three, synchronize demolition with passage this train.
427.sl_trans: Tretjič, sinhronizirajte rušenje s prehodom tega vlaka.

431.en_source: Can we get there in time, sir?

432.sl_source: Yai pravi, da smo oddaljeni tri dni hoda.
432.en_source: Yai says we're two to three days' march from the Kwai.
432.sl_trans: Yai pravi, da smo od reke Kwai oddaljeni dva do tri dni pohoda.

433.en_source: If we set a faster pace, we could make it before sundown on the 12th.
433.sl_trans: Če bi pospešili tempo, bi lahko prišli pred sončnim zahodom 12. decembra.

434.en_source: It's worth it for the train.

438.sl_source: Če ne bi popravili radia, za vlak ne bi vedeli.
438.en_source: If you hadn't fixed the radio, we wouldn't know about the train.
438.sl_trans: Če ne bi popravili radia, ne bi vedeli za vlak.

439.sl_source: Vedno se zgodi kaj nepričakovanega, ne.
439.en_source: Well, there's always the unexpected, isn't there?
439.sl_trans: Vedno se zgodi kaj nepričakovanega, kajne?
